title: Greetings from a noob.
content:
Hello everyone,  
Thought I would make a quick post and say hello to everyone. Just joined, with the hopes of having some of my design being ripped apart by the brutal critique dogs of Typophile, as well as meeting some great designers, and people in general. So feel free to ask any questions, or anything else.

 [‹ Type Collection for Education](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162610/http:/typophile.com/node/38283 "Go to previous forum topic") [garment, shoemaking & knitting software ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162610/http:/typophile.com/node/38468 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Fantômas

comments.content: Welcome to Typophile. We’re more than willing to rip your designs apart. ;)

Hey, Nik, welcome to my other hangout!

—Bruce

Bruce,  
Do I know you? I think you have me confused with someone else ;)
